com.sindice.query
Class CacheQuery

java.lang.Object
  com.sindice.query.Query
      com.sindice.query.CacheQuery

public class CacheQuery
extends Query

Specific query implementation to access the Sindice Cache service.

Author:
Michele Mostarda (mostarda@fbk.eu)

Constructor.

Parameters:
url - the page URL to be retrieved.
fields - list of fields to be selected.
output - the output format for the response.
pretty - whether or not the output is prettified.
callback - the callback to be applied to response.
fieldRegexFilters - regex filters to be applied.

Method Detail

getFieldName

protected static java.lang.String getFieldName(java.lang.reflect.Field f)
Returns the name of the JSON mapping associated to the given field.

Parameters:
f - input field to be mapped.
Returns:
the field mapping.

getParametersString

protected static java.lang.String getParametersString(java.lang.Object obj)
                                               throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
Creates the HTTP parameters string for the given object. The parameters string is built of a sequence of couples [<param-name>=<param-value>&]+, one for every object field, where param-name is the mapping of the field and param-value is the value of the field.

Parameters:
obj - object used to generate the parameters string.
Returns:
string of parameters.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalAccessException

performQuery

public CacheResult performQuery()
                         throws SindiceException
Performs the query represented by this object.

Returns:
the result of the query.
Throws:
SindiceException - if an error occurs while querying the service or while retrieving the result.
